subs.text: Just before Drummer shipped I sent an email to Manton Reece, the developer and runner of micro.blog, asking if he was interested in being the first blogging system to hook up with Drummer via the OPML bridge. The same interface we use in Drummer to connect to Old School.
Well here it is. He works fast. :rocket:
Just watched the video -- I love how he did it. Beautiful.
